name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering high-performing backend systems. Proficient in **Python**, specifically with frameworks such as **Django** and **Django REST**, and skilled in database management with **PostgreSQL**. Experienced in leveraging **Celery** for task management, and monitoring systems using **Sentry**, **Datadog**, and **Grafana**. Knowledgeable in version control with **Git**, and capable of utilizing search and analytics engines like **Elasticsearch** and **ClickHouse**. Well-versed in container orchestration with **Kubernetes** and API documentation standards through **OpenAPI** and **DRF Spectacular**. Recognized for delivering impactful solutions in financial systems and AI/ML pipelines while working with leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** together with **Django** and **Django REST** to design and implement robust backend services, enhancing the efficiency of document automation and user onboarding workflows.
Engineered event-driven architectures utilizing **Celery** and **Redis**, achieving a **30%** increase in the efficiency of asynchronous processing for financial transaction requests.
Deployed scalable microservices leveraging **Azure App Services** and implemented **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, resulting in a **40%** reduction in deployment time.
Developed and maintained reliable data pipelines for regulatory compliance using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring a **98%** on-time data delivery rate.
Conducted thorough security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, enhancing authentication systems for strength and scalability.
Collaborated effectively with diverse teams to overcome system integration challenges, maintain compliance, and oversee strategic release initiatives.

• Developed backend systems using **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes.
• Created event-driven microservices with **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests, enhancing processing speeds by **30%**.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to maintain consistent and scalable environments across **5** critical applications.
• Engineered data pipelines for secure regulatory data exchange, utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate the data flow, improving data processing efficiency by **25%**.
• Conducted security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage authentication and enforce secure access controls.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management, achieving a **98%** on-time delivery rate.

• Developed backend services utilizing **Python** and **PostgreSQL** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, directly enhancing trading operations by **30%** in efficiency.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors using **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, facilitating high-frequency transactions with a data delivery latency of under **50 milliseconds**.
• Ensured smooth integration by delivering data through REST APIs powered by **Django REST**, collaborating effectively with frontend teams to enhance user interactions.
• Complied with regulatory requirements including MiFID II and GDPR, meticulously adhering to robust internal data security protocols and achieving a compliance score of **95%** in audits.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites employing **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers to streamline QA and CI processes, reducing bug-related regressions by **40%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution, and improving process management efficiency by **20%**.
• Utilized monitoring tools including **Sentry**, **Datadog**, and **Grafana** to proactively address system performance, ensuring system uptime of **99.9%** and enhancing operational visibility.
• Collaborated on containerized deployments using **Kubernetes**, optimizing resource allocation and management across distributed services.
